K10D0307_H0310:214a-1: a'a yu pa ryanta s'u tra /
K10D0307_H0310:214a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0307_H0310:214a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0307_H0310:214a-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
K10D0307_H0310:214a-7: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
K10D0307_H0310:214a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:214a-10: dge slong dag khyed sems can rnams kyi tshe'i mtha' thos par 'dod dam /
K10D0307_H0310:214a-12: de'i dus la bab lags so //
K10D0307_H0310:214a-14: de'i dus la bab lags so //
K10D0307_H0310:214a-16: sems can rnams kyi tshe'i mtha' bstan pa bcom ldan
K10D0307_H0310:214a-17: 'das las thos nas dge slong dag 'dzin par bgyid
K10D0307_H0310:214a-19: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do //
K10D0307_H0310:214a-21: dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni ring na bskal pa gcig ste /
K10D0307_H0310:214a-22: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-0: @214b dud 'gro rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni ring na bskal pa gcig ste /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-1: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-3: mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de yi dvags rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-4: nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-5: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-6: yi dvags rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lnga brgya thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-7: de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo khri lnga stong yod de /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-8: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-10: ji ltar rab tu che ba'i lus 'greng zhing //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-11: mchu dang mid bskams shin tu sdug bsngal ba //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-12: rang gi skras yog kha gdangs gnam du lta //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-13: sna ni khab ltar rab tu phra ba dang //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-14: rus gong 'dra lus gcer bu rang skras yog /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-15: gzugs mi sdug pa 'greng zhing thod pa thogs //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-16: bkres dang skom dang ngal bas ra ba gzir gang //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-17: cho nges 'debs shing kun tu rgyug pa dag /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-18: nyam thag skad 'byin sdug bsngal tshor ba myong //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-19: phan tshun phrag dog ser sna 'dir bsten cing //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-20: 'dir ni sdig pa'i las dag byas pa yis //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-21: yi dvags 'jig rten du ni de dag skyes //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-23: shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-24: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:214b-26: nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad lo lnga brgya ste /
K10D0307_H0310:214b-27: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-1: gi sgra mi snyan rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ste /
K10D0307_H0310:215a-2: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni med do //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-3: rgyu gang gis sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong thub la /
K10D0307_H0310:215a-4: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni med ce na /
K10D0307_H0310:215a-6: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni bdag
K10D0307_H0310:215a-7: gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la
K10D0307_H0310:215a-8: tshe nges pa yod cing 'di nas shi 'phos nas
K10D0307_H0310:215a-9: kyang khyad par du 'gro ba ste /
K10D0307_H0310:215a-10: phyi ma la mtho ris su nye bar 'gro'o //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-12: rgyu des na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi
K10D0307_H0310:215a-13: rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong thub la bar
K10D0307_H0310:215a-14: ma dor 'chi ba ni med do //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:215a-16: dbul bas sdug bsngal sems can dag /
K10D0307_H0310:215a-17: gzhan gyi nor la smon par byed //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-18: de dag dam pa ma bsten pas //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-19: gzhan gyi mngag gzhug ngan cing dman //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-20: longs spyod dag dang ldan pa yi //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-21: phyug cing nor mang sems can ni //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-22: nor dang 'bru dang skye bor ldan //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-23: de dag dam pa bsten pa yin //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-24: bsod nams phyug pas nyer 'tsho ba'i //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-25: dge ba'i las ni 'dir byas pas //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-26: 'byor pa chen po phun sum tshogs //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-27: lha bzhin du ni dga' bar byed //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-28: lkog gyur gang yin mi snang ste //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-29: mngon sum 'di la blta bar byos //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-30: gang zag kha cig 'jig rten na //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-31: bde ldan sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:215a-32: byang phyogs gling gi mi rnams ni //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-0: bdag gi med cing yongs 'dzin @215b med; ;dpag bsam las byung gos sten pa //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-1: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-2: de dag grang dang tsha ba med //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-3: de dag la ni nad med cing //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-4: gzugs dang kha dog phun sum tshogs //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-5: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-6: byang phyogs gling na ma nyams shing //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-7: ma grugs dag cing gtsang ba dang //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-8: shin tu dkar ba'i s'a lu skye //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-9: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-11: de rnams rtag tu mdzes pa dang //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-12: de dag zas ni 'ju byed gang //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-13: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-14: de dag la ni tshod ma dang //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-15: sran tshod kyang ni cung zad med //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-16: kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa'i //

K10D0307_H0310:215b-22: bcad kyang yal ga las skyes te //

K10D0307_H0310:215b-25: de dag 'bab chu bsil ba dang //

K10D0307_H0310:215b-28: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //

K10D0307_H0310:215b-33: de dag rol mo'i ljon shing bzang //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-34: gos kyi ljon shing mang po dang //
K10D0307_H0310:215b-35: spos kyi ljon shing phun sum tshogs //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-2: spos dang me tog rol mo dang //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-3: de bzhin du ni gos rnams kyang //

K10D0307_H0310:216a-10: de dag la ni khro med cing //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-11: ser sna dang ni phrag dog med //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-12: phan tshun dag tu rtse byed pa //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-13: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //

K10D0307_H0310:216a-16: rdul rnams med par byed pa ste //

K10D0307_H0310:216a-20: sdug bsngal med pas mya ngan med //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-21: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-22: ma dag gis kyang rang gi bu //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-23: lam stong dag tu bor te 'gro /
K10D0307_H0310:216a-25: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-26: de dag gang yang du ba med //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-28: bya dag gis ni gling 'phyag pa //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-29: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-30: khor yug tu ni 'obs kyis bskor //

K10D0307_H0310:216a-33: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-34: mi yi tshe ni lo stong po //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-35: zad pa dag tu byas nas ni //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-36: bar ma dor ni 'chi med pa //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-37: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //
K10D0307_H0310:216a-38: dpal ni rgyas par spyad nas su //

K10D0307_H0310:216b-2: de ni sngon byin 'bras bu yin //

K10D0307_H0310:216b-8: tshe lo brgyad khri pa dang /
K10D0307_H0310:216b-10: tshe lo bcu par yang 'gyur ro //

K10D0307_H0310:216b-15: du 'tsho ba gang yin pas legs par bde bar
K10D0307_H0310:216b-17: lo brgya las cung zad cig lhag par thub bo //
K10D0307_H0310:216b-19: 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs ni bcu myong bar 'gyur te /
K10D0307_H0310:216b-20: gnas skabs dang po ni zhan cing gan rkyal du
K10D0307_H0310:216b-21: nyal pa ste byis pa yin no; ;gnas skabs gnyis

K10D0307_H0310:217a-6: dgun gyi dus tshigs brgya dang /
K10D0307_H0310:217a-7: dpyid kyi dus tshigs brgya dang /
K10D0307_H0310:217a-8: dbyar gyi dus tshigs brgya rnams so //

K10D0307_H0310:217a-18: nyin zhag sum khri drug stong du 'tsho ste /

K10D0307_H0310:217a-23: bar chad du gyur pa ma gtogs par zan bdun

K10D0307_H0310:217a-30: ma rnyed pas ma zos pa dang /

K10D0307_H0310:218b-0: nyan @218b thos rnams la 'khu byed pa //

K10D0307_H0310:218b-2: sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur //

K10D0307_H0310:218b-7: las de yis ni thig nag gi /
K10D0307_H0310:218b-8: dmyal ba rnams su de dag skye //
K10D0307_H0310:218b-10: mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de

K10D0307_H0310:218b-12: go / nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /
K10D0307_H0310:218b-13: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /

K10D0307_H0310:218b-15: de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo nyis stong thub
K10D0307_H0310:218b-16: bo // de mi'i ltang brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang /

K10D0307_H0310:218b-18: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //

K10D0307_H0310:218b-21: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /

K10D0307_H0310:218b-28: mi dge'i las rnam gsum byas shing //
K10D0307_H0310:218b-29: las dge rnam gsum ma byas te //
K10D0307_H0310:218b-30: las de dag gis bsdus 'joms kyi //
K10D0307_H0310:219a-2: ba lang ra lug ma he dang //
K10D0307_H0310:219a-3: ri dvags bya gag phag rnams dang //
K10D0307_H0310:219a-4: de bzhin srog chags gzhan gsod pa //
K10D0307_H0310:219a-5: bsdus gzhom dag tu skye bar 'gyur //

K10D0307_H0310:219a-21: lta bur brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong thub ste /

K10D0307_H0310:219a-23: bye ba phrag dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong dang /
K10D0307_H0310:219a-24: bye ba phrag brgyad yod de /

K10D0307_H0310:219a-27: 'jigs su rung la drag shul can //
K10D0307_H0310:219a-28: lag pa gnyis ni khrag gis bskus //
K10D0307_H0310:219a-29: sdig pa'i las ni spyod pa yis //
K10D0307_H0310:219a-31: gzhal lugs g-yo dang sgyu byed mi //
K10D0307_H0310:219b-0: skye bo @219b dag ni yid phyung bas //
K10D0307_H0310:219b-4: mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go /
K10D0307_H0310:219b-5: nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /
K10D0307_H0310:219b-6: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /

K10D0307_H0310:219b-9: lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod de /

K10D0307_H0310:219b-13: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /

K10D0307_H0310:219b-15: sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo
K10D0307_H0310:219b-16: de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong yod do
K10D0307_H0310:219b-17: // de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang /
K10D0307_H0310:219b-18: bye ba phrag lnga 'bum khri nyis stong drug cu rtsa drug yod de /

K10D0307_H0310:219b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:219b-21: lta ba'i thibs pos khebs gyur cing //
K10D0307_H0310:219b-22: sred pa'i g-yog pas g-yogs pa dag /
K10D0307_H0310:219b-23: sdig pa'i chos ni spyod pa yis; ;du 'bod dag tu skye bar 'gyur //
K10D0307_H0310:219b-24: yid gcugs nyams pa'i mi dag ni /
K10D0307_H0310:219b-25: kha spu slong zhing 'bar ba yis //
K10D0307_H0310:219b-26: bskor ba'i khyim gyi nang chung nas //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-0: @220a *// gtam pa brnogs pa'i mi dag ni //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-1: ral gri yis ni lus gtub cing //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-2: bya rgod bya rog 'ug pa khyis //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-5: mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa
K10D0307_H0310:220a-6: de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin
K10D0307_H0310:220a-7: zhag gcig go / nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-8: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-9: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad
K10D0307_H0310:220a-10: ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri
K10D0307_H0310:220a-12: de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag drug dang /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-13: lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig yod de /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-14: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-15: de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig go /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-16: nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-17: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-18: sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i sems can
K10D0307_H0310:220a-19: dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo de lta
K10D0307_H0310:220a-20: bur brtsis pa'i lo khri drug stong yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-21: de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba sa ya phrag brgyad dang /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-23: lo bye ba khrag khri drug stong lnga brgya sum cu yod de /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-24: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:220a-26: dge slong bram ze dge ba dang //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-27: de bzhin du ni pha ma la //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-28: gang zhig rtag tu gdung byed pa //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-29: de ni tsha bar skye bar 'gyur //
K10D0307_H0310:220a-30: 'dir ni gang zhig gdung ba yis //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-0: @220b skye bo mang po gdung byed pa //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-1: las de dag gis tsha ba yi //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-2: dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-4: khyed chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i mtha' nyan par 'dod dam /
K10D0307_H0310:220b-6: de'i dus la bab lags so //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-8: de'i dus la bab lags so //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-9: bcom ldan 'das las dge slong dag gis gang chu
K10D0307_H0310:220b-10: bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i
K10D0307_H0310:220b-15: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-18: 'di la til yul ko sa la'i khal bcu tshad
K10D0307_H0310:220b-19: nyi shu shong ba'i khal bcu tshad nyi shu pa
K10D0307_H0310:220b-20: til gyis byur bur gang bar gyur pa de las
K10D0307_H0310:220b-21: mi la la zhig gis lo brgya 'das shing til
K10D0307_H0310:220b-23: til khal bcu tshad nyi shu shong ba'i khal bcu
K10D0307_H0310:220b-24: tshad nyi shu pa de thabs 'dis myur du yongs
K10D0307_H0310:220b-25: su zad cing gtugs par gyur kyang /
K10D0307_H0310:220b-27: chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi
K10D0307_H0310:220b-28: tshe'i tshad ni de lta ma yin par nga smra'o
K10D0307_H0310:220b-29: // chu bur can gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar chu bur rdol gyi gcig yin no //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-30: chu bur rdol gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar so thams thams kyi gcig yin no //
K10D0307_H0310:220b-31: so thams thams kyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar kyi hud zer gyi gcig yin no //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-0: kyi hud zer gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar aa chu zer @221a *//
K10D0307_H0310:221a-2: aa chu zer gyi nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar autpa la ltar gas pa'i gcig yin no //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-3: autpa la ltar gas pa'i nyi shu ji lta ba de ltar padma ltar gas pa'i gcig yin no //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-4: padma ltar gas pa'i nyi shu ji lta ba de
K10D0307_H0310:221a-5: ltar padma ltar gas pa chen po'i gcig yin no
K10D0307_H0310:221a-6: // lhas byin gyi phyogs dge slong ko ka li kas dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0307_H0310:221a-7: moonggal gyi bu la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas
K10D0307_H0310:221a-8: rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba
K10D0307_H0310:221a-9: chen po padma ltar gas pa chen por skyes so
K10D0307_H0310:221a-11: de lta bas na de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
K10D0307_H0310:221a-12: sdong dum tshig pa la'ang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed
K10D0307_H0310:221a-13: par mi bya na rnam par shes pa dang ldan
K10D0307_H0310:221a-14: pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de
K10D0307_H0310:221a-15: ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:221a-17: mi zhig skyes par gyur pa na //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-18: gang gis bdag ni gcod byed pa'i //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-19: kha nas sta re'i tshig 'byung ba //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-20: nyes par smra bas smra ba ni //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-21: gang dag smad bya bstod byed cing //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-22: skye bo bstod bya smod byed pa'i //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-23: sdig gang bde ba mi myong ba'i //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-24: sdig de de yi kha na gsog /
K10D0307_H0310:221a-25: gang 'dir rgyan pos bdag nor yal //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-26: 'di ni sdig pa chung du ste //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-27: gang zhig bde gshegs sdang sems bskyed //
K10D0307_H0310:221a-29: ngag dang yid kyis kyang ni sdig byas shing //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-0: @221b gang zhig 'phags la smod pa dmyal 'gro ste //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-1: stong phrag brgyar ni chu bur rdol nas su //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-2: chu bur can du sum cu rtsa drug go /
K10D0307_H0310:221b-3: sdig pa'i sems kyis bden par mi smra ba //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-4: bdag nyid brlag cing dmyal bar 'phen par byed //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-5: de yid dri mas ma rnyogs par byed de //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-6: kha na ma tho med pa de bzod do //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-8: sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed gcig yin te /
K10D0307_H0310:221b-9: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:221b-12: skye 'gyur dge ba spangs nas ni //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-13: 'dir ni mi sdug las byas pas //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-14: rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-15: dge sbyong bram ze dge ba dang //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-16: pha dang ma yang de yin te //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-17: gang yang bla ma gzhan gsod pa //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-18: rab tu tsha bar de 'tshed do //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-20: dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig ste /
K10D0307_H0310:221b-21: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:221b-22: mi gti mug can lhas byin gyis dge 'dun mthun pa phye ba dang /
K10D0307_H0310:221b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /
K10D0307_H0310:221b-24: dge slong ma dgra bcom pa bsad pas rang gi
K10D0307_H0310:221b-25: lus de nyid kyis dmyal ba chen po mnar med
K10D0307_H0310:221b-26: pa der skyes so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0307_H0310:221b-27: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0307_H0310:221b-28: 'phags pa rnams kyis bstan pa yi //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-2: blo ngan gang zhig smod byed pa //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-4: de ni 'bras bu rlag par byed //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-5: dge bar 'gyur ba brjod bya ste //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-6: sdig pa can dag mi brjod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-7: dge ba smras na legs par 'gyur //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-8: sdig pa smras na sreg 'gyur bas //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-9: gal te smra na dge ba smra'i //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-10: sdig pa smras na rlag par 'gyur //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-11: byis pa rnams ni sdig smra ste //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-12: 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin no //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-14: las ni shas cher byas pas na //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-15: las de dag gis mnar med pa'i //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-16: dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-18: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed de /
K10D0307_H0310:222a-19: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-21: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa'i bzhi cha gsum thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222a-22: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-24: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222a-25: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-27: 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gnyis thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222a-28: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-30: tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222a-31: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222a-33: 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222a-34: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-0: dge slong @222b dag ;dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bcu drug thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-1: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-3: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-4: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-6: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-7: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-9: sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-10: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-12: bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyis brgya rtsa lnga bcu thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-13: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-15: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa lnga brgya thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-16: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-18: 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-19: mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-20: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-22: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyis stong thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-23: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-25: shin tu mthong gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi stong thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-26: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-28: gya nom snang gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad stong thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:222b-29: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:222b-31: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa khri drug stong thub ste /
K10D0307_H0310:223a-3: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro
K10D0307_H0310:223a-4: ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyi
K10D0307_H0310:223a-5: khri ste / bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:223a-7: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro
K10D0307_H0310:223a-8: ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi
K10D0307_H0310:223a-9: khri ste / bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:223a-11: ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro
K10D0307_H0310:223a-12: ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa drug
K10D0307_H0310:223a-13: khri ste / bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:223a-15: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du
K10D0307_H0310:223a-16: nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni
K10D0307_H0310:223a-18: bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10D0307_H0310:223a-20: de ltar dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas
K10D0307_H0310:223a-21: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
K10D0307_H0310:223a-25: de dag ni srid pa'i rtse mo yin no //
K10D0307_H0310:223a-26: de dag ni srid pa 'byung ba yin te /
K10D0307_H0310:223a-27: de dag ni 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams 'ong ba dang /
K10D0307_H0310:223a-32: srid pa'i 'byung bas chog shes par gyis shig /
K10D0307_H0310:223a-33: nga ni srid pa mngon par sgrub pa chung du
K10D0307_H0310:223a-34: la'ang tha na de'i skad cig tsam yang bsngags pa
K10D0307_H0310:223a-35: mi mdzad do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10D0307_H0310:223a-36: srid pa mngon par sgrub pa ni sdug bsngal yin pa'i phyir te /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-0: mi gtsang ba ni nyung du'ang @223b mi zhim na mang po lta ci smos /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-1: de ltar de bzhin du nga ni srid pa mngon
K10D0307_H0310:223b-2: par sgrub pa chung du la'ang tha na de'i skad
K10D0307_H0310:223b-3: cig tsam yang bsngags pa mi mdzad do //
K10D0307_H0310:223b-6: srid pa mngon par sgrub pa ni sdug bsngal yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0307_H0310:223b-7: so so'i skye bo byis pa thos pa dang mi
K10D0307_H0310:223b-8: ldan pa de dag ni 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khro
K10D0307_H0310:223b-10: yang du dmyal ba rnams dang /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-11: yang dang; yang du dud 'gro rnams dang /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-13: yang du ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su kun tu rgyug /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-14: kun tu rab tu rgyug go /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-16: de lta bas na de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-17: srid pa rgyun chad par bya ba gang yin pa
K10D0307_H0310:223b-18: la brtson par bya zhing sred pa mngon par mi
K10D0307_H0310:223b-19: bsgrub par bya'o // dge slong dag /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-20: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K10D0307_H0310:223b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-22: dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0307_H0310:223b-25: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sidha dang /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-26: lotstsha ba bande dge ba'i dpal gyis bsgyur /
K10D0307_H0310:223b-27: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra sidha dang /
